name: Punchy
description: Punchy is a script that explores themes of confrontation, direct action, and physical conflict. Characters have abilities related to combat, aggression, and forceful resolution.
author: Jams, Josh, Kerry, & Zak
specialRules: Focus on confrontational and aggressive abilities
Characters with combat and forceful mechanics
Explores concepts of direct action and physical conflict
setupNotes: This script emphasizes confrontation and direct action. Players should be prepared for abilities involving combat, aggression, and forceful resolution.

winConditions.evil: Survive to equal the number of good players

howToRun: Lean into direct conflict and clear stakes. Keep kill/protect timing crisp. Clarify once-per-game triggers and announcement windows to avoid arguments. Track forced movement or control effects carefully so executions and night deaths tell a cohesive story.

firstNight.description: Wake all Minions together. Show them who the other Minions are and who the Demon is
Wake the Demon. Show them who their Minions are. Give them 3 character tokens as bluffs

tipsAndTricks: Good: Force evil to commitâ€”demand claims, set duel-style challenges, and use protection to bait Demon choices. Chain-verify claims via Undertaker/Professor style checks. Evil: Manufacture public grudges and push hasty executions; sell a protective cover story to justify survivals and redirect heat.
bluffing: Adopt assertive table presence. Bluff as protective or duel-trigger roles to control cadence. When pressure mounts, pivot to Soldier/Saint style bluffs to explain survivals and discourage challenges.

modifiers.note: Baron adds 2 Outsiders and removes 2 Townsfolk.
Godfather adds 1 Outsider and removes 1 Townsfolk.
